AAE.caption: Up Background Color
AAE.doc: OPTIONAL. Sets the background color of the connected alert box (when reconnecting is successful). This can be a color (#4183D7) or more complex CSS rules. When using a color's hex code, include the # sign before the hex code.
AAE.name: connected_background_color

AAF.caption: Up Font Color
AAF.doc: Assigns the font-color CSS property. Include a hash (#) before the color's hex code.
AAF.name: connected_font_color

AAG.caption: Down Background Color
AAG.doc: OPTIONAL. Sets the background color of the down alert box (right when the internet is disconnected). This can be a color (#4183D7) or more complex CSS rules. When using a color's hex code, include the # sign before the hex code.
AAG.name: down_background_color

AAH.caption: Down Font Color
AAH.doc: Assigns the font-color CSS property. Include a hash (#) before the color's hex code.
AAH.name: down_font_color

AAI.caption: Connecting Background Color
AAI.doc: OPTIONAL. Sets the background color of the connecting alert box (when trying to reconnect). This can be a color (#4183D7) or more complex CSS rules. When using a color's hex code, include the # sign before the hex code.
AAI.name: connecting_background_color

AAJ.caption: Connecting Font Color
AAJ.doc: Assigns the font-color CSS property. Include a hash (#) before the color's hex code.
AAJ.name: connecting_font_color

AAK.caption: language
AAK.doc: Select the language you would like the message to be displayed in.
AAK.name: language
